DOC.brief_summary: Coasting one mean reduce risk OHSS patient risk severe OHSS . During coast gonadotrophin administration withhold serum E2 level drop range consider safe . Prolonged coast reduces chance implantation pregnancy . The aim study explore whether increase dose GnRH Antagonist shorten coast period without adverse effect cycle outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Administration Increased Dose GnRH Antagonist Coasting Decreasing Risk Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome ( OHSS )
DOC.detailed_description: 30 patient undergoing IVF use GnRH antagonist protocol present high response gonadotrophin stimulation , randomize one two group : group A - withdrawal gonadotrophin support continue daily dose 0.25 mg GnRH antagonist . group B - withdrawal gonadotrophin support continue double daily dose 0.5 mg GnRH antagonist . The main outcome measure duration coasting ( day ) rate serum E2 drop ( % ) .
DOC.criteria: 30 woman undergo IVF cycle GnRH Antagonist protocol 35 year old . E2 high 3000 pg/ml . 3 fail fresh IVF cycle .
